overview: Collected over the course of three decades, this compilation rounds up 27 of Israel's entries in the Eurovision Song Contest, an international music competition in which countries submit a song to be performed on live television. Highlights include Israel's winning songs -- "Abanibi" (1978) and "Diva" (1998) -- plus footage of opening and closing night festivities from the 1979 and 1999 contests, when Israel played host.
title: Israel at Eurovision: Song Festival
